bug.question: I have six legs and I love to buzz. I make yummy honey, who am I?
I crawl on the ground and carry things with my friends. We work together to find food. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then I make a chrysalis, and finally, I have colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves when I'm young
🎨 I am known for my beauty

bug.question: I am a small beetle with red wings and black spots. People say I bring good luck. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My name includes a title for a female person
🔴 I am often red with spots
🌱 I eat aphids to help plants

bug.question: I jump really high and I'm green. I love to eat plants and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My color helps me hide in the grass
🎶 I make a sound with my legs
🌱 I can damage crops in farms

bug.question: I glow in the dark, flashing my light at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I'm easiest to see in the dark
🪲 I am a type of beetle

bug.question: I have eight legs and spin a sticky web to catch my food. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in a web that I created myself
🕷️ People can be afraid of me
🪰 Flies get stuck in my trap

bug.question: I am a long, skinny bug that looks just like a twig on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🧍 I look like a part of a tree
🌳 I can be hard to spot

bug.question: I have big eyes and long, folded arms. I wait very still to catch my prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 My arms look like I'm praying

bug.question: I have wings, but I am not a bird. I am known for my beautiful patterns and I drink nectar from flowers. What am I? (Hint: My name includes a mythical creature)

hints.text: 🧚‍♀️ Some people think I am magical
🌺 I am often found near flowers

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have lots of colorful scales. What am I?
I am very big and blue, and boats like to sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me near a beach.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the sand and have pinchers. What am I?
I'm a home underwater, often made of coral. Many fish live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Lots of sea creatures call me home.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 You might see me in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very smart sea animal and I like to play. I make clicking sounds to talk. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 I love to jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I am a large, slow-moving sea creature with a hard shell on my back. What am I?
I am a giant of the sea. I sing songs and spout water from my blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live at the bottom of the sea. I can squeeze into tight places and change color. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️🖐️ I have eight arms, not hands.

ocean.question: I am a very small animal that lives in a shell. After I leave my shell, it washes up on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 You can find my empty home on the shore.
🐌 I am a type of mollusk.
